Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Provides for municipal residency restrictions
Summary: Provides for municipal residency restrictions; sets permissible maximum distance from a school grounds at 1,500 feet.
LawCode: Ren ยง168-w to be ยง168-x, add ยง168-w, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to municipal residency restrictions
